data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Chatra, Jharkhand, India know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Chatra, Jharkhand, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Chatra, Jharkhand, India.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.section_summary: On average, 10 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Chatra, Jharkhand, India.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Chatra, Jharkhand, India.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Chatra, Jharkhand, India into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Chik Baraik people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Chatra, Jharkhand, India.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.prayer: Father, let every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the county of Chatra, Jharkhand, India.

data.section_summary:
the county of Chatra, Jharkhand, India has a population of 50,000.

We estimate Chatra has 550 people who might know Jesus, 607 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 48,843 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 550 believers in the county of Chatra to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.
